backend/main.mo: Main backend actor defining clients, interventions, user profiles, and access‑controlled CRUD operations with authorization and blob‑storage mixins.
backend/migration.mo: No‑op migration module that returns the previous state unchanged.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping feature IDs to affected frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of major frontend files, hooks, and components for build reference.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base/theme configuration defining light and dark mode CSS variables and global styles.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML template configuring PWA metadata, icons, and root mount point.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: PWA manifest describing app name, icons, theme colors, and startup settings.
frontend/public/sw.js: Service worker implementing basic install, cache, fetch, and activation logic for offline support.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app entry defining routes, authentication gating, layout, and service worker registration.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminUnloc: Empty placeholder file for an admin unlock dialog component.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Dialog prompting new authenticated users to submit their name and saving the profile through backend hooks.
frontend/src/components/blacklist/Blackl: UI panel to view, add, update, or remove a client’s blacklist status with comments and media uploads.
frontend/src/components/clients/CreateCl: Dialog for creating a new client, collecting basic contact and address fields and submitting via a mutation.
frontend/src/components/clients/EditClie: Dialog for editing an existing client, preloading current data and sending updates through a mutation.
Wrapper around Badge that adds custom variants like success, warning, and pending with style overrides.
frontend/src/components/guards/Authentic: Route guard that redirects unauthenticated users and shows a loading spinner during identity initialization.
frontend/src/components/interventions/Ad: Dialog to add an intervention with date, comments, and media, then submit it via a mutation.
frontend/src/components/interventions/Ed: Dialog to edit an intervention, preloading existing fields and allowing date, comments, and media updates.
frontend/src/components/interventions/In: Displays a list of interventions with author checks, edit/delete actions, media preview, and loading/empty states.
frontend/src/components/layout/MobileLay: Mobile page layout showing user info, logout button, main content, and footer.
frontend/src/components/media/MediaPicke: Provides UI for selecting media from gallery or capturing photos via camera, returning selected files.
frontend/src/components/media/MediaPrevi: Renders a grid of media thumbnails using direct URLs from ExternalBlob objects.
frontend/src/components/sync/Connectivit: Shows online/offline status, pending sync count, and a sync button when applicable.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useBlacklist.ts: Provides mutations to mark or unmark clients as blacklisted, supporting offline queueing and query invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useClients.ts: Contains queries and mutations for fetching, searching, and creating/updating clients with offline support.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUser.ts: Hooks for fetching and saving the current user profile, role, and admin status using the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for Internet Identity authentication, exposing identity state, login, logout, and status helpers. Handles loading stored identities and creating AuthClient instances.
frontend/src/hooks/useInterventions.ts: Defines React Query hooks to fetch, add, update, and delete interventions with offline support and status toasts. Uses the actor API and queues operations when offline.
frontend/src/hooks/useOnlineStatus.ts: Tracks browser online/offline state and exposes a boolean isOnline value. Listens for window connectivity events.
frontend/src/hooks/useSync.ts: Manages automatic and manual syncing of queued offline operations. Tracks sync state, pending count, and triggers sync when online.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining light/dark theme variables and utility classes. Includes safe-area padding helpers and base styling.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Exports a cn function combining clsx and tailwind-merge to merge class names safely.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider. Renders the main App component.
frontend/src/offline/db.ts: Implements IndexedDB storage for offline operations and caching. Provides helpers to add, fetch, remove outbox items, and store arbitrary cached data.
frontend/src/offline/outbox.ts: Adds operations to the offline outbox by wrapping addToOutbox. Simplifies enqueuing offline tasks.
frontend/src/offline/syncEngine.ts: Synchronizes all queued offline operations by replaying them through an actor. Removes successfully processed items and logs failures.
frontend/src/pages/ClientDossierPage.tsx: Page displaying a client’s details, interventions, and blacklist info with editing dialogs. Handles loading states and navigation.
frontend/src/pages/ClientsPage.tsx: Lists clients with search, debounced filtering, loading states, and navigation to client details plus a dialog for creating new clients.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Displays a login card and triggers Internet Identity login, redirecting authenticated users to the clients page.
frontend/src/pwa/registerServiceWorker.t: Registers the service worker on window load and logs success or failure.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read, persist, and clear URL parameters using query strings, hash routing, and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending colors, fonts, and layout utilities, and enabling typography, container queries, and animations plugins.
project_state.json: Project metadata defining access-control rules, blacklist behavior, removed admin role, existing features, and pending feature requests.
